alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and northeastern Lee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buckingham, or near Lehigh Acres, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Charleston Park, Olga, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Buckingham, Villas, Fort Myers Shores, Page Park, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport, Alva, Suncoast Estates, Tice and Gateway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
